title: How to Make Whole Wheat Hamburger Buns

steps.headline: Make the yeast base.
steps.description: In a large bowl, mix the yeast, water, oil, and sugar/honey thoroughly. Set aside for about 15 minutes to rest.

steps.headline: Use a wooden spoon to thoroughly mix the rest of the ingredients except for the melted butter.
steps.description: You'll want to achieve a dough-like mixture.

steps.headline: Lightly sprinkle flour on a board or clean counter.
Roll out the dough to about 3/4 inch (1.9 cm) thickness.
Use a 4-inch (10.16 cm) dough cutter to create circles.
Add the dough circles on a baking sheet.
steps.description: Use a baste brush to glaze the tops with the melted butter.

steps.headline: Set the dough to rise for an additional 30 minutes.

text: Make the yeast base. In a large bowl, mix the yeast, water, oil, and sugar/honey thoroughly. Set aside for about 15 minutes to rest. Use a wooden spoon to thoroughly mix the rest of the ingredients except for the melted butter. You'll want to achieve a dough-like mixture. Lightly sprinkle flour on a board or clean counter.  Roll out the dough to about 3/4 inch (1.9 cm) thickness.  Use a 4-inch (10.16 cm) dough cutter to create circles.  Add the dough circles on a baking sheet. Use a baste brush to glaze the tops with the melted butter. Set the dough to rise for an additional 30 minutes.  Bake them for 10 minutes at 425ºF/220ºC.  Let cool for 5 minutes.
